block.name: Log10
block.doc: Calculates the logarithm of the input signal. Implements the function out = n*log10(in) + k.

param.name: n
param.doc: Sets the multiplier constant n. For calculating dB from a voltage this can be set to 20.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
